alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 10:08AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Nueces, southeastern San Patricio and north central Kleberg Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1008 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Clarkwood, or 9 miles east of Driscoll, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Driscoll, Corpus Christi International Airport, Gregory, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Flour Bluff, Corpus Christi Country Club, South Texas Botanical Gardens, Corpus Christi North Beach, Cabaniss Field, Kings Crossing Subdivision, Bay Area Medical Center, Cole Park, Spohn Hospital South, Driscoll Childrens Hospital, Del Mar College Heritage Campus, Texas A&M University Corpus Christi, Clarkwood and Downtown Corpus Christi. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 1 and 6. US Highway 181 between mile markers 640 and 648. US Highway 77 near mile marker 678. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Nueces Islands
